entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries and rain showers. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:33 PM PST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the morning and late in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:33 PM PST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 late in the evening except gusting to 60 near mainland valleys and inlets overnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:33 PM PST Thursday 02 March 2023
